name: Mouse BoyFriend (Demo)
description:
It has been Joshie's dream to become a great dance battler for as long as he can remember. However, he is the worst dancer in the entire city and everyone seems to hate him... everyone except his friend and mentor Mouse Boyfriend. Mouse Boyfriend is the greatest and most glamorous dancer this city has ever seem. Things are okay until an unexpected betrayal occurs and Joshie is forced to dance his way through his struggles all on his own. In this comedy RPG, you play as joshie, who must dance his heart out to prove himself to everyone and win the city dance competition. Joshie will learn that sometimes it takes a shattered heart to fully expose the beauty that is within. 

*This game is an early access demo so the game is in the process of being developed. This demo consists of the story's prologue. Some changes may occur to gameplay through development.
